message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a price of $12,000. I believe it will be very beneficial for you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $9,000 is still quite low for me. Could you consider $10,500? This would be a fair compromise.
Alice, I'm still interested in the product, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. How about we settle on $9,500? I think this is a fair price for both of us.
